meanings.definition: The act of breaking off in small pieces, as in the spalling of concrete.
meanings.sent1: The spalling of the old wall created a mess on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The spalling of the concrete sidewalk needed repair.
meanings.sent3: The spalling of the cookie made it crumble into tiny bits.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like spalling rock, breaking into fragments.
meanings.sent5: The spalling of the ice sculpture was a beautiful disaster.
